text: Noatak is a village in Alaska. The village is found on the Northwest Arctic Borough, above the Arctic Circle. At the 2020 census, 570 people lived there. There are no roads or railways going to the city, and can only be traveled to by airplane to Noatak Airport, or maybe on foot. ==References== Category:Villages in the United States Category:Census-designated places in Alaska
title: Noatak, Alaska
